arts.ttl: Who is Mika Biereth? The ex-Arsenal forward and a sliding doors moment
arts.sum: Arsenal’s failure to sign a striker this season has been used as a stick to beat the Gunners with. The club’s title dream has evaporated in recent weeks, with season-ending injuries to Kai Havertz and Gabriel Jesus leaving the North Londoners light in the final third. Successive games without a goal have left Arsenal 13 […] The post Who is Mika Biereth? The ex-Arsenal forward and a sliding doors moment first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Mika Biereth scores third hat trick this month in Monaco win over Reims
arts.sum: Biereth scored his third hat trick of the month when Monaco beat Reims 3-0 in Ligue 1 on Friday. Monaco rose above Lille and into fourth place in Ligue 1, equal on points with third-placed Nice, which has a game in hand.
